name: com.unity.render-pipelines.high-definition-sotr
displayName: Shadow of the Road Render Pipeline. High Definition RP based

samples.description: Adds additional post-processing data to your project, such as Lens Dirt textures.
Adds Shader Graph samples to your project. Open the SampleScene to see typical use cases for the Hair, Fabric, and Decal Master Nodes for Shader Graph.
Adds the deprecated procedural sky of HDRP.
